channel.title: Tech 🔧 on Yunyi's Blog

item.title: R Visualising
item.description: Reviewing visualing data with R with this exmaple project。 Import libraries library(readr) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) Import data From csv to dataset Read datasets/confirmed_cases_worldwide.csv into confirmed_cases_worldwide Select/filter data # Filter for China, from Feb 15 china_after_feb15 <- confirmed_cases_china_vs_world %>% filter(is_china == "China", date >= "2020-02-15") Plot One line # Draw a line plot of cumulative cases vs. date # Label the y-axis ggplot(confirmed_cases_worldwide, aes(date, cum_cases)) + geom_line() + ylab("Cumulative confirmed cases") Multiple lines # Using confirmed_cases_top7_outside_china, draw a line plot of # cum_cases vs.
